mapper.sql: id, src_screening_notice_id, screening_task_id, screening_plan_id, screening_org_id, district_id, school_id, school_name, school_no, grade_id, grade_name, grade_type, class_id, class_name, student_id, id_card, birthday, gender, student_age, student_situation, student_no, student_name, create_time, province_code, city_code,area_code,town_code,parent_phone,nation
mapper.select: select msg.id as grade_id, msg.name as grade_name, msc.id as class_id, msc.name as class_name from (select grade_id, class_id from m_screening_plan_school_student where screening_plan_id = #{screeningPlanId} and school_id = #{schoolId} group by grade_id, class_id) grader_class left join m_school_grade msg on grader_class.grade_id = msg.id left join m_school_class msc on grader_class.class_id = msc.id

select mspss.student_name as name, mspss.student_no as sno, ms.gender from m_screening_plan_school_student mspss left join m_student ms on mspss.student_id = ms.id where mspss.screening_plan_id = #{screeningPlanId} and mspss.grade_id = #{gradeId} and mspss.class_id = #{classId}
